entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Trois-Rivières Airport 11:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 10:57 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:57 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 10:57 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
